name: alexa-lg-webos-tv
description: A controller and gateway for adding Alexa support to LG WebOS TVs that don't have native Alexa Support
author: Paul E. Bender <pebender@gmail.com> (http://www.backinthirty.net)

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && (cd pkg/controller && npm run clean) && (cd pkg/gateway && npm run clean)
scripts.install_modules: npm install && (cd pkg/controller && npm install) && (cd pkg/gateway && npm install)
scripts.build: (cd pkg/controller && npm run build) && (cd pkg/gateway && npm run build)
scripts.pack: (cd pkg/controller && npm run pack) && (cd pkg/gateway && npm run pack)
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run install_modules && npm run build && npm run pack
